status.moveSelected: Tap an adjacent cell to move

rules.title: How to play
rules.rule1: Each player has 3 pieces to place
rules.rule2: After all pieces are placed, move them to adjacent cells
rules.rule3: Get three in a row to win
rules.rule4: Tap your piece to select, then tap where to move
rules.rule5: No more draws - play until someone wins!
